thread.subject: New Conference Venue Inquiry
thread.body:
Dear The Royal Crest,

Our company, [Company Name], is planning a conference for [Number] attendees in [Month, Year]. We are interested in learning more about your conference facilities and pricing, particularly regarding corporate rates for a group of our size.  Please let us know if this is something you can assist with.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Your Company]

thread.subject: Re: New Conference Venue Inquiry
thread.body:
Dear [Your Name],

Thank you for your inquiry.  To best assist you with your request regarding corporate rates, I've forwarded this email to our Senior Sales Manager, who can provide you with the necessary information.

Sincerely,
The Royal Crest Front Desk

thread.subject: Re: New Conference Venue Inquiry
thread.body:
Dear [Your Name],

Thank you for your interest in The Royal Crest for your upcoming conference. I'd be happy to discuss our corporate rates and conference facilities.  Could you please provide me with some additional information, such as:

* Your desired dates
* The number of attendees
* Your specific requirements (e.g., audio-visual equipment, catering needs)

Once I have this information, I can prepare a customized proposal for you.

Sincerely,
[Sales Manager Name]
Senior Sales Manager
The Royal Crest

thread.subject: Re: New Conference Venue Inquiry
thread.body:
Dear [Sales Manager Name],

Thank you for your prompt response.  Our desired dates are [Start Date] to [End Date]. We expect approximately [Number] attendees.  Our specific requirements include [List of Requirements - e.g., projector, screen, microphones, basic catering].

We look forward to receiving your proposal.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]

thread.subject: Re: New Conference Venue Inquiry
thread.body:
Dear [Your Name],

Thank you for providing the additional information. I'm preparing a detailed proposal and will send it to you within [Timeframe - e.g., 24-48 hours].

Sincerely,
[Sales Manager Name]

thread.subject: Re: New Conference Venue Inquiry - Proposal Attached
thread.body:
Dear [Your Name],

Please find attached a detailed proposal outlining our conference packages and pricing tailored to your needs.

Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.

Sincerely,
[Sales Manager Name]
